title: Adolescents with frequent PE more informed about physical activity's role in health

title_detail.value: Adolescents with frequent PE more informed about physical activity's role in health

summary: Frequent, long-term instruction in physical education not only helps adolescents be more fit but also equips them with knowledge about how regular physical activity relates to good health.

summary_detail.value: Frequent, long-term instruction in physical education not only helps adolescents be more fit but also equips them with knowledge about how regular physical activity relates to good health.
